meanings.definition: In the twelfth place or position.
meanings.sent1: Twelfthly, she added the final touch to her painting.
meanings.sent2: The team crossed the finish line twelfthly in the race.
meanings.sent3: The cat twelfthly chased its tail in circles, amusing everyone.
meanings.sent4: The stars twinkled twelfthly in the night sky, like distant diamonds.
meanings.sent5: The clock struck twelfthly, marking the end of the day.

meanings.definition: Coming after the eleventh in a series.
meanings.sent1: She received the twelfthly invitation to the party.
meanings.sent2: The twelfthly book on the shelf was her favorite.
meanings.sent3: The twelfthly cupcake in the box looked too cute to eat.
meanings.sent4: His twelfthly attempt at solving the puzzle finally succeeded.
meanings.sent5: The twelfthly flower in the garden bloomed brightly in the sun.
